main event: Observations of white or green stars flying through the sky on several occasions.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 1-2 seconds.
The observer saw the objects on multiple occasions.
The objects were described as resembling 'white or green stars'.
The observer wrote a letter to an Army Captain about the sightings.
The observer made a reference to a newspaper article about 'flying saucers' in relation to their own sightings.
